# Number 1
This code chunk below creates my funtion

```{r}
my.function <- function(x, y, p) {

model <- lm(y ~ x)

residuals <- residuals(model)

my_data <- as.data.frame(cbind(x, y, residuals))

order_vector <- order(abs(my_data$residuals), decreasing = TRUE)

my_data <- my_data[order_vector,]

logical_vector <- (c(rep(TRUE, p), rep(FALSE,length(my_data$x) - p)))

my_data$outcome <- logical_vector

return(my_data)

}
```
